Sentencas: Solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) generate clean energy via electrochemical reactions at high operating temperatures.
Titulo: Investigation of temperature distribution and performance of SOFC short stack with/without machined gas channels

Sentencas: The distribution of the electrochemical reactions in the cell depends on the flow field design of the interconnectors.
Titulo: Investigation of temperature distribution and performance of SOFC short stack with/without machined gas channels

Sentencas: The non-uniform distribution of the reactions due to the flow field design may cause the development of thermal stresses which may lead to micro or macro cracks in the cell and thus a significant performance loss even a cell failure.
Titulo: Investigation of temperature distribution and performance of SOFC short stack with/without machined gas channels

Sentencas: In this study, the effects of operating current densities and fuel flow rates on the temperature profile within the cell and the cell performance are experimentally investigated for two different flow-field designs with Crofer 22 APU interconnectors, i.e. Design I and Design II.
Titulo: Investigation of temperature distribution and performance of SOFC short stack with/without machined gas channels

Sentencas: Design I, which mimics the conventional interconnector structure, has machined gas channels and porous nickel mesh at the anode side for the distribution of hydrogen and the collection of the current generated in the cell while at the anode side of Design II, only wire woven nickel mesh is employed.
Titulo: Investigation of temperature distribution and performance of SOFC short stack with/without machined gas channels

Sentencas: The experimental results indicate that Design II provides much more uniform temperature distributions under 20-40 A current loads and 1-2 NL/min H-2 flow rates when compared to those of Design I. Furthermore, Design II exhibits a higher peak power density than Design I at an operation temperature of 800 degrees C. (C) 2016
Titulo: Investigation of temperature distribution and performance of SOFC short stack with/without machined gas channels
